snippet: New programs will be curated by Mr. Moran, the center’s artistic director for jazz; Mason Bates, its composer in residence; the composer Chris Thile; and the choreographer Damian Woetzel.
abstract: New programs will be curated by Mr. Moran, the center’s artistic director for jazz; Mason Bates, its composer in residence; the composer Chris Thile; and the choreographer Damian Woetzel.

headline.main: Jason Moran and Other Guest Artists to Curate Kennedy Center Season
